Attributes.description: Common issues faced by Chief Information Officers (CIO): Cost and value of information technology (IT), IT priorities, IT and the Board of Directors, Business-IT alignment, IT governance, IT talent management, standardization vs. innovation, project and vendor management/partnering, and managing security and risks.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 18:00, End Time: 21:00, Building: David, Room: Lam
